TopicTitle: What to use a really big launcher for

Articles.Content: I built an SSTO capable of lifting 155 tons to LKO 72km/104km by mistake. It was for an Apollo-type mission. It was extremely overpowered. What do I use it for now?
Fuel depot in LKO, Eve Return, Jool-5 Grand Tour...
Use it to take tourists on suborbital trips to the sun, or put a seat right on top and make Kerbals go really really fast.

(/sarcasm) () "Put up a download link so I can use it." (/sarcasm\_end)

But seriously, just use it for what the fist guy said.
Launch a large station to Eeloo in one launch.

thx guys

sending a base to mine somewhere without an atmosphere using it

where should it go?
Those really big launchers that can space 85 or more tons I tend to use for fuel depots.
